meta.description: Default assumptions for Panelin v4.0. Used when data is missing in pre-quotation mode. Every assumption is explicitly declared in the output.

span_defaults.nota: Span in meters between supports. Used only when span_m is not provided AND mode != formal.

structure_defaults.nota: Default structure type when not specified.

flete_defaults.nota: Reference shipping cost in USD. Always declared as estimate.

sai_minimum.nota: Minimum SAI score required per quotation mode.

iva.nota: IVA 22% already included in catalog prices. NEVER add IVA on top.

autoportancia_safety_margin_nota: Use exact nominal values from manufacturer table (no safety margin by default).
